QuestData.Title: It Does You No Good In The Keg
QuestData.Description: I been thinkin'.$b$bWe got all this beer that Chen brewed, and we got all these people that you've gathered. We should bring the two together.$b$bThere's a bunch o' folks out there in the fields, riskin' their lives for Pandaria. You an' I should at least bring 'em a keg or two.$b$bThey might raise their mugs in victory. They might enjoy one last drink before gettin' skivvered by a mantid. Either way, I wouldn't want 'em to fight without a good brew in their belly.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring beer to Zhu's Wardens, the Crane Wing Priests, the Shado-Pan, and the tauren settlers.

Objectives.Objective: Deliver beer to Crane Wing Priests
